text: I'm Allyson Roman and today I am going
to roast a whole side of salmon the
reason I like doing the whole piece as
opposed to smaller pieces is because
it's almost impossible to overcook and
you can literally just cook it on a
sheet tray because the salmon cooks
super super fast I'm gonna make all of
my side dishes and things to pair with
it beforehand I'm gonna use this Near
East quinoa rice blend because it has
quinoa and has brown rice and it also
comes with this really awesome flavor
packet that has flavors like lemon and
parsley things that are already gonna go
well with the salmon anyway it's like
working in total harmony with each other
make this ahead of time let it cool now
I'm gonna add all the green stuff it's
kind of like a kitchen sink herb
situation whatever you have lying around
is great but I like to use cilantro
parsley mint dill would also be great
here all the herbs this particular green

which is great maybe add a little bit

and I'm also going to serve it with a

with lemon and garlic a total meal
because the salmon filet happens to be
skinless I'm going to roast it on a bed
of really thinly sliced lemons and
that's going to do two things one it's

delightfully lemonade the best fruit in
